About.paragraph: Prepare for because at present, online teaching media Available for everyone to use, but due to following the web, if you want to use the way we want, there will be a cost. Therefore, I want to create a website for online media for teachers for everyone, especially instructors to make teaching materials. We will make a variety of features such as word cloud, multiple choice and a kahoot-like layout and within the website will be easy to use and modern. to achieve ease of use The website will be made out in a free form. It can only be used within the Faculty of Engineering.
